Great game, classic, and you can pick it up for cheep in a sale. 100% worth it. oh also replayability for sure!

Portal 2 story is great with interesting characters and suited perfect pace. The plot twists are well done and it only tells you what you need to know. The story is also supplemented by the great humor.
And as a puzzle game, so the puzzles and level design need to be good. Luckily, they're done flawlessly. On top of that the environments are also amazing and add lots to the world.
Once you're done with the story mode there's a level creator that is perfectly made and allows you to do just about anything you want. People have used this to make some crazy and amazing levels. The community, while I'm not sure how active it is now, has always been very helpful and creative. You'll never run out of content as long as talented map creators exist.
Definitely a must play for anyone.

la verdad en mi opinion este juego es una joya es muy entretenido y tiene buena historia, algo que lo diferencia de los otros juegos es que este te pone a pensar la forma de encontrar la salida, algo que la malloria de los juegos carece porque son simplemente ir matando bichos a diestra y simiestra.
La cosa se pone mucho mejor cuando entras en multijugador, porque no solo tienes que coordinar tus acciones si no tambien la de tu amigo (lo mismo para el) puede que eso suene aburrido pero yo me he tirado unas risas jugando con amigos :v
muy recomendado este juego

This is the single steam single player game that every single one should have on their steam account.

I believe that the replay value of this game is not going to reach replayability of games such as Dishonored or Telltale's Walking Dead franchise, but the game definitely leaves something in you after beating it.

I have not yet tried the Coop mode, but I believe that it would be same amount of fun to play with a friend.

The story is very good, music is nice, though sound effects may get a little annoying if you get stuck in one place for too long.
Valve's last best single player game 10/10

No game has ever made me laugh so hard, fucking 10/10.

Easily one of my favorite games of all time. If you've never played the first Portal, you're going to be okay. You might miss out on a couple of jokes here or there, but Portal 2 does a great job of standing on its own. Apart from the fun puzzles and challenging levels, the storytelling of Portal 2 is some of the best I've ever seen. I love that there is so much to be discovered by exploring the areas, and that the game gives you space to learn on your own. 

I think this game is one of the few titles that every gamer should experience at least once.
